results.title: Topical atenolol versus pilocarpine: a double-blind study of the effect on ocular tension.
results.text_hl: ...Topical @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (a beta1-adrenoceptive antagonist), @CHEMICAL_Pilocarpine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010862 @@@pilocarpine@@@, and placebo were tested in a randomised double-blind crossover trial of 8 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Eye_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015817 @@@ocular hypertenion@@@.

citations.NLM: Wettrell K, Wilke K, Pandolfi M. Topical atenolol versus pilocarpine: a double-blind study of the effect on ocular tension. Br J Ophthalmol. 1978 May;62(5):292-5. PMID: 350263
